statements: SELECT * FROM social_media_interactions;
SELECT interaction_id, user_id, content FROM social_media_interactions ORDER BY interaction_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, sentiment_score FROM social_media_interactions WHERE feedback_rating > 3;
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_date FROM social_media_interactions WHERE sentiment_score < 0;
SELECT user_id, feedback_rating FROM social_media_interactions WHERE content LIKE '%positive%';
SELECT * FROM social_media_interactions WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY interaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, content, sentiment_score FROM social_media_interactions WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, AVG(sentiment_score) AS avg_sentiment FROM social_media_interactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(interaction_id) > 5 ORDER BY avg_sentiment DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS interaction_count FROM social_media_interactions WHERE feedback_rating IS NOT NULL GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY interaction_count DESC;

SELECT user_id, MIN(sentiment_score) AS min_sentiment, MAX(sentiment_score) AS max_sentiment FROM social_media_interactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING MAX(sentiment_score) - MIN(sentiment_score) > 0.3 ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM social_media_interactions;
SELECT user_id, post_text FROM social_media_interactions ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT sentiment_score, post_text FROM social_media_interactions WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT COUNT(interaction_id) AS total_interactions FROM social_media_interactions;
SELECT user_id, feedback_text, rating FROM customer_feedback ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM social_media_interactions WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY interaction_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, post_text FROM social_media_interactions WHERE interaction_id = 10;
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating >= 3 ORDER BY feedback_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM social_media_interactions JOIN customer_feedback ON social_media_interactions.user_id = customer_feedback.user_id;
SELECT user_id, post_text, feedback_text, rating FROM social_media_interactions LEFT JOIN customer_feedback ON social_media_interactions.user_id = customer_feedback.user_id;
SELECT * FROM social_media_interactions ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT user_id, interaction_type, interaction_timestamp FROM social_media_interactions WHERE sentiment_score > 0.7
SELECT user_id, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback ORDER BY feedback_timestamp ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT user_id, average_sentiment_score FROM user_sentiment_analysis WHERE average_sentiment_score < 0.5
SELECT * FROM user_sentiment_analysis WHERE sentiment_category = 'positive'
SELECT id, user_id, interaction_type FROM social_media_interactions ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT user_id, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_timestamp >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT user_id, sentiment_category FROM user_sentiment_analysis WHERE average_sentiment_score >= 0.5
SELECT user_id, interaction_type, sentiment_score FROM social_media_interactions WHERE sentiment_score < 0
SELECT user_id, interaction_type, sentiment_score FROM social_media_interactions WHERE sentiment_score >= 0 ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC
SELECT * FROM social_media_users;
SELECT username, follower_count FROM social_media_users ORDER BY follower_count DESC;
SELECT post_text, timestamp FROM posts WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT comment_text FROM comments WHERE post_id = 5 ORDER BY comment_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, reaction_type FROM reactions WHERE post_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM social_media_users WHERE follower_count > 100 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT username, follower_count FROM social_media_users INNER JOIN posts ON social_media_users.user_id = posts.user_id;
SELECT post_id, post_text, timestamp FROM posts WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY post_id;
SELECT post_id, COUNT(*) AS total_comments FROM comments GROUP BY post_id HAVING total_comments > 5 ORDER BY total_comments DESC;
SELECT username, reaction_type FROM social_media_users INNER JOIN reactions ON social_media_users.user_id = reactions.user_id WHERE reaction_type = 'LIKE';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT post_content, post_time FROM posts WHERE sentiment_score > 0.8;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM interactions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT comment_text FROM comments WHERE comment_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT username, email FROM users ORDER BY join_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM interactions LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, post_id, interaction_type FROM interactions WHERE interaction_time > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM users JOIN posts ON users.user_id = posts.user_id;
SELECT username, email, join_date FROM users WHERE username LIKE '%John%';
SELECT post_id, post_content, sentiment_score FROM posts ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
